alert.note: Alert for Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 7:41PM CST until February 28 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Sangamon River at Monticello affecting Piatt County. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sangamon River at Monticello. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flooding of agricultural areas begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 14.5 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Sangamon River Monticello 13.0 10.4 Thu 7 pm CST 13.1 14.4 14.2 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
